sentence: Can i use cash to pay for a new electric car? no, you have to charge it.
explanation: Charge meaning to require a payment or cost. Charge meaning to energize a battery.
first_new_sentence: I need to pay my phone bill, so I must charge it to my credit card.
second_new_sentence: The technician will charge the electric cars battery before returning it.

sentence: Al pacinos brother is steaming that his parents... named him cap.
explanation: Cap meaning a lid or cover. Cap meaning a limit or maximum.
first_new_sentence: He placed a cap on the jar to keep the content fresh.
second_new_sentence: The cap on spending is causing frustration among the team.
